DOC.brief_summary: Single center , double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled trial evaluate analog pain score patient present emergency department ( ED ) complaint headache . A total 150 patient age 13-55 presenting emergency department headache enrol October 2015 - October 2016 . Patients randomize pain score side effect record 0 , 30 , 60 , 90 minute . Follow-up perform telephone 24 hour .
DOC.criteria: Emergency Department patient complain headache migraine Males females age 1355 English primary language Abnormal blood pressure ( > 200/100 ) Sudden rapid onsent ( normal worst pain minute ) Fever Trauma Any history mass , stroke , head injury cause abnormal anatomy QT great 450 m EKG Allergy Haldon Any alter mental status ( GCS < 15 ) Pregnancy Any abnormality neurologic exam Any clinician concern would require CT scan brain Any prisoner ward state
